result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Final pre-trial on November 29, 2022 at 11:30 am.

11:01 AM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, Defendant Brian Leonard Bos not in court.  Attorney Dan Firkus in court for Brian Leonard Bos.  Attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for State of Wisconsin.  Includes 19CT164, 21CF143, 21CF712, & 22CF257.  Court reviews files and notes Atty Firkus states DE assumed he could appear by zoom today but was told that is not approved, DE to be here in person.  Court authorizes warrant- STAYED. Court schedules one more FPT which will be the cut off for negotiations, DE is to be here in person.  Court states case # 21CF143 will be #1, other felony's will trail, CT as last case for day of trial.  ADA Becker makes statements regarding Officer Alberts appearing by zoom for trial. Adjourned at 11:06 AM. bph
Final pre-trial scheduled for November 29, 2022 at 11:30 am.

02:30 PM  CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: K. Anderson, ADA:  Michael Joseph Becker, DF ATTY: Nicholas R White, DF: Brian Leonard Bos appeared. INCLUDES 22CF228 and 22CF257. Court advises of rights and possible penalties regarding a preliminary hearing.  Court finds DF has freely, voluntarily, and knowingly waived the right to a preliminary hearing on both cases, finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DF probably committed that felony and binds over for trial on both cases. Court administratively transfers 22CF257 to Branch 3. Court sets SETC and ARGN on 22CF228. Adjourned: 2:41 PM. kma  Settlement conference scheduled for May 18, 2022 at 02:00 pm.  Arraignment scheduled for May 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.

1:04 PM  CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: K. Anderson, ADA: Bela Alexander Ballo, DF ATTY: Abrianna Dolfi for today, DF:  Brian Leonard Bos appeared from jail. INCLUDES 22CF228 (INIT), 22CF257 (INIT), 21CF143 (RW), 19CT164 (RW) and 21CF712 (RW). Atty. Dolfi did not have the opportunity to meet with DE. DE makes statement regarding non-appearance at yesterday's jury trial. INIT on 22CF228 and 22CF257: Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Waives reading. ADA Ballo requests separate bonds for each file. Atty. Dolfi makes bond argument. Court sets bond. Court notes Atty. Firkus is public defender appointed on other cases. Atty. Dolfi requests PH within time limits. Court sets PH on 22CF228 and 22CF257 and status conference on remainder of cases. QUASH WARRANTS on 21CF143,19CT164 and 21CF712.
